critique: The executive order seems to be a dry legal document. It does not seem to want to evoke any strong emotions. Maybe a tiny bit of joy that the land is being restored. Initial assessment: Disgust: 1, Fear: 1, Joy: 2, Sadness: 1, Surprise: 1. Upon further reflection, even joy is too strong. The document is very neutral.Revised assessment: Disgust: 1, Fear: 1, Joy: 1, Sadness: 1, Surprise: 1
